short_summary: Inspection, Testing and Maintenance of Central Heating Plant Boilers - Petawawa, Ontario
description: DEFENCE CONSTRUCTION CANADA (DCC) \u2013 PA616451_79075 \u2013 Inspection, Testing and Maintenance of Central Heating Plant Boilers \u2013 Petawawa, OntarioThe work includes, but is not necessarily limited to, the supply of labour, material, supervision and equipment necessary for Inspection, Testing, Maintenance (ITM) and Minor Repair of three (3) boilers at the Central Heating Plant. ITM services are to be carried out in accordance with equipment manuals and referenced standards. This project contains security requirements.
